#Introducing the market data collector

= Introduction =

Download yahoo market data.
The technology used is *core Java* with maven.

= Details =

The goals is to provide a framework/application that will allow the user to do market analysis at the cheapest cost.

In the first steps it will include :
  * To retrieve market data from the internet ( currently from yahoo feed )
  * To build a framework for backtesting of trading strategy.
  * To build a Frontend to manage the application.
